Professional Stump Removal

Get Rid Of Your Stumps

After tree cutting, stump grinding is one of the most efficient ways to get rid of stumps from property without damaging the grounds. It is used for residential and commercial properties alike, and it allows for quick re-use of the space immediately following the process. If you’re sick of having unsightly tree stumps dotting your land, call Mills Tree Experts Today 770-461-5379.


Stump grinding is only done with the use of specialized equipment. After a tree cutting service, we use equipment to chip and grind the stump down to about 8 inches below ground level, leaving a shallow hole in the ground.

Why Remove My Stumps


Tree stump removal is a big part of our business, and we’re often asked if it's necessary. Trees are a thing of nature, so leaving a tree stump in the earth is certainly natural. However, there are a few good reasons to go ahead with a removal.


  • Curb Appeal
  • Property Value
  • Safety
  • Space
  • New Growth
